title: Old pesticide laws are stalling farmersâ€™ drone tech use, says CropLife leader [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Europe risks missing out on the next wave of precision agriculture because its pesticide rules were written for a pre-drone era, the chair of CropLife Europe, Jens Hartmann, has warned
summary_public: Europe risks missing out on the next wave of precision agriculture because its pesticide rules were written for a pre-drone era, the chair of CropLife Europe, Jens Hartmann, has warned
